Title: ⭐️[ANN]⭐️ [XTC] STAKING COIN ICO | Blockchain Backed Credits Network | 15th FEB
Body: I hope this project is really well-thought of even from the start. Since the dev team decided to be anonymous, then, the team needs to prove themselves that they will not disappear after the ICO. That's one of the concerns of most investors. So you need to convince them that this is a long-term project. Though you didn't meet the target of 300k$ in your pre-sale stage, still 264k+$ is not bad at all to start your project. You should show something already to them, otherwise, you're just collecting money here.

Author: StakingCoin
Title: ⭐️[ANN]⭐️ [XTC] STAKING COIN ICO | Blockchain Backed Credits Network | 15th FEB
Body: https://i.imgur.com/sdQh9yt.jpg STAKING COIN Disrupt the multi-billion dollar peer-to-peer loans industry with Blockchain Backed Credits Network  TELEGRAM CHAT | TELEGRAM ANN  |  WEBSITE  |  TWITTER  |  FACEBOOK   Participate in our bounty program here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2521175 and airdrop here https://goo.gl/1xBWge     WHAT IS STAKING COIN?  StakingCoin is a peer-to-peer, community driven decentralised cryptocurrency that allows lenders to store and invest their wealth in a non-government controlled currency, and even earn a substantial interest on investment and also enables individuals take loans with collateral and low interest rates, you can get loans without the usual credit rating/immigration/residency discrimination faced when you try to take loans from the centralised banking system. Also with our unique staking platform, you can stake your XTC coins for profits of up to 100% per year, one of the highest staking returns in the cryptocurrency space. You will be in complete control of your coins at all times and we will reward you for helping to stabilise the network. This means any person that holds Staking Coin in their wallet will receive interest on their balance of up to 100% a year.    Users can lend their XTC coins to the credits platform for rewards of up to 15% per month, the highest in the industry.   THE SYSTEM The Staking Coin Network defines a set of rules for the integration of several agents participating in the credit lifetime, allowing connections between lenders and borrowers located anywhere in the world, regardless of currency.  The protocol that we propose seeks to provide an objective measure of the credit risk assumed by the lenders, diminish that risk or even neutralize it totally and, in case of default, it provides an alternative mechanism for managing the debt collection in the borrower’s country of residence decreasing losses throughout the network.  By making use of blockchain technology and including a special agent called "Cosigner", XTC Network manages to reduce the traditional banking brokerage costs and management fees, allowing better conditions for both sides, lenders and borrowers, with the consequent significant improvement in financial inclusion.   Do you wish you could secure your future with financial stability in a safe way? Are you tired of centralised banking and the misleading promises of third party lenders/Banks doing what they want with your money? This is not just an investment tool; it is the investment tool you need to jump start your financial security!   AIRDROP  https://i.imgur.com/cgTbVS9.jpg   1,000,000 XTC Coins ($200,000) has been allocated to the AIRDROP program for first 10,000 users. We are going to distribute 50 XTC Coins (worth ~$10 ) to each participant who completes at least 3 of the following 4 tasks-   1. Join Telegram Announcement group: https://t.me/stakingcoin 2. Join Telegram Chat group: https://t.me/stakingcoinchat 3. Follow Twitter account: https://twitter.com/stakingcoin 4. Register on the Staking Coin Website: https://app.stakingcoin.com/register  You can get more XTC by referring users to the platform, and you also earn 5% of their contributions to the ICO.   Sign up here: http://goo.gl/1xBWge  INITIAL COIN OFFERING Staking Coin Network Crowdsale starts on the 15th of February 2018 and will last for 1 Month or until $3,000,000 After successful ICO, StakingCoin Credits Platform will launch including an internal exchange and the market will open on several top tier exchanges for trading.   ICO ROUND1 PRICE = 7 XTC per USD (20% Bonus)  ICO ROUND2 PRICE = 6 XTC per USD (10% Bonus)  ICO ROUND3 PRICE = 5 XTC per USD    REFERRAL/AFFILIATE SYSTEM  Our referral bonus system has been designed to last till the fifth generation. Starting with 5% of what your direct referrals (first generation) contributes to the ICO or the credits platform, to 3% of what the second generation invests, to 2% of what the third generation invests, to 1% of what the fourth generation invests, and finally 0.5% of what the fifth generation invests.    INSURANCE The Staking COin insurance policy will help protect your funds that you have loaned out to us. 80% of our ICO funds will be placed in a secure offline wallet to protect client funds. We feel that if a client makes a loan to us that it should be protected from a market crash or anything that may happen. We want to make sure we can pay every single loan back if any emergency occurs.    VERY LOW FEES Transaction Fees will be lower and faster than your current Bitcoin transactions. You can expect to see your transaction in your five minutes or less. Transaction fees will be rewarded to miners. Mining pool fee 1% will go into a wallet for insurance on client loans.  Exchange Fees- 50% of exchange fees will go toward any maintenance upgrades to help keep the platform running and the other 50% will go into the loan insurance wallet.    SPECIFICATIONS  Coin name-               StakingCoin Coin abbreviation-                 XTC Algorithm-                         Scrypt Type-                             PoW/PoS Block Reward-               100 Coins Circulating Supply-      30,000,000 Total coin supply-      105,000,000 Coinbase maturity-        20 blocks PoS percentage-       100% p/year     COIN METRICS Available XTC coins are allocated as follows-  Presale              4,500,000  ICO                   18,000,000  Bounty               2,000,000  Team                  8,500,000  Cold Storage       30,000,000    ROADMAP  Our roadmap can be found in more detail in our whitepaper http://stakingcoin.com/Staking%20Coin%20Whitepaper.pdf and here: http://stakingcoin.com/roadmap.jpg    HOW DO I CONTRIBUTE?  To purchase Staking Coin, visit https://stakingcoin.com/ico or directly to the dashboard at http://app.stakingcoin.com/register and follow the checkout process. Only Ethereum is accepted for contributions.      IMPORTANT LINKS Facebook- https://web.facebook.com/StakingCoin-Lending-2018124148458083/ Twitter- https://twitter.com/stakingcoin Telegram Ann- https://t.me/stakingcoin Telegram Chat- https://t.me/stakingcoinchat Website- https://stakingcoin.com Bounty Thread- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2521175 Airdrop- https://goo.gl/1xBWge Whitepaper- http://stakingcoin.com/Staking%20Coin%20Whitepaper.pdf Github- https://github.com/stakingcoin/stakingcoin Email- Support@stakingcoin.com
